articles.articleHeading: Scaler | Free Masterclass - Build a Database from Scratch | Certificates
articles.explanation:
About this Masterclass
Database Management System (DBMS) is an evergreen technology that has been used by every organisation for decades. While working on DBMS can be a simple task, managing, altering and securing the data is a crucial concept to understand for any Database Administrator.

Do you want to expand your build a strong foundational understanding of Database Management Systems and develop a database of your own?

Join Utkarsh Gupta in a FREE Masterclass on September 5, 2021, Sunday, at 5 PM ISTwhere you will learn everything about Database Management Systems and design a database from scratch.

Your What You Will Gain From This Masterclass:

  • Learn how to design the Entity-Relationship Model of Database
  • Understand Normal Forms in DBMS
  • Learn Indexing for faster queries in the Database

How to register?

  1. First of all, Visit the Build a Database from Scratch by Utkarsh Gupta - Scalar page - Click here
  2. Click on Sign Up to Register
  3. Verify and register yourself or share with your friends
  4. That's it, Attend the live session on September 5, 2021, 5:00 PM - 8 pm

Certificates -  All attendees get certificates from Anshuman Singh and Scaler Academy! Please be careful while entering your details while registering since they will go on your Certificates

Free Masterclass Details

  • STARTS ON: September 5, 2021, 5:00 PM
  • ENDS ON: September 5, 2021, 8:00 PM
  • VENUE: Online
  • DURATION: 3 hours

Instructor Utkarsh Gupta

  • Ex-Googler in Munich, Germany
  • AIR 1 in Google Hash Code 2019
  • Master at Codeforces & a 6-star coder at Codechef
